overview: Pack your bags for an amazing adventure at Disney’s Animal Kingdom, leave civilization behind and join Journey Jack on a voyage around the wildest land at Walt Disney World.  This time capsule captures all of the action at Disney’s Animal Kingdom in 2004.  With stops at Dinosaur, Chester & Hester’s DinoRama, where we get to meet them.  Then a trip to Kali River Rapids and the exotic tigers.  We stop by camp Minnie-Mickey and Rafiki’s planet watch.  Then, Journey, Jack encounters giraffes and elephants face-to-face on Kilimanjaro Safaris ending the day with the daily Jamin’ Jungle Parade.
title: Disney's Anmal Kingdom
